name: Enterprise-dev-repo
body:
### Welcome to our Enterprise-dev-repo project
Ever needed to store your development artifacts, version them and perform search on them? Then you came to the right place. Our project intends to not only deliver these functions needed by the Enterprise Middleware industry, but to deliver them in a modern, high-speed and reliable fashion.

### Technology behind the curtain
Red Hat's [Undertow web server](http://blog.arungupta.me/undertow-benchmarks-wildfly/) winning performance benchmarks combined with [WebSocket protocol](http://www.websocket.org/aboutwebsocket.html) promises fast web interaction. Embedded [BaseX XML database](http://basex.org/) on the backend provides standardized XQuery document access and good scalability. Also we don't forget about user experience as well... that's why we've bet on a modern [OpenUI5 MVC](http://openui5.org/) JavaScript framework built upon JQuery, which supports responsive one-page client side applications with two-way XML/JSON/ODATA binding.

### Architecture design
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/10115368/16357342/221be8f4-3af4-11e6-844b-7a66517eb0cc.png)

### Authors and Contributors
This project started at the Masaryk University as a part of PB138 course. Developers are:
* Michal Holič
* Ondřej Gasior
* Peter Hutta

[DocBook work reports](https://github.com/Holdo/enterprise-dev-repo/tree/gh-pages/reports)
